name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across various industries, including healthcare and finance. Strong expertise in AWS and Linux environments, infrastructure as code using **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Puppet**, and building secure, automated systems that ensure compliance with security best practices. Proficient in **CI/CD** processes to enhance reliability and streamline deployment workflows.
Skilled in **Python** and **Go** for backend development, with significant experience in distributed systems and API security. Adept at implementing zero trust access controls and network security measures to safeguard sensitive data. Well-versed in both frontend and backend technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **Flutter**, and backend frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**.
Proficient in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation, leveraging tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps. Equipped with strong communication skills, fostering collaboration among teams to deliver exceptional results.
